titles.title: How Far Will You Walk In Obedience, My Son?

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How far will you walk in obedience, my son?
All the way, all the way to the cross.
I desire Thy will and not my own,
All the way, all the way to the cross.
My steps are ordered and planned by Thee.
You know the way that I cannot see.
Hold my hand, Lord, and walk with me,
All the way, all the way to the cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How far will you walk in submission, my son? etc.
How far will you walk in the wilderness, my son? etc.
How far will you walk in forgiveness, my son? etc.
